sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Courier package contains addcr, authenumerate, cancelmsg, courier, courier-config, courieresmtpd, courierfilter, courierldapaliasd, courierlogger, couriermlm, couriertcpd, couriertls, deliverquota, dotforward, esmtpd, esmtpd-msa, esmtpd-ssl, filterctl, imapd, imapd, imapd-ssl, lockmail, mailbot, maildiracl, maildirkw, maildirmake, maildrop, makeacceptmailfor, makealiases, makedat, makehosteddomains, makemime, makepercentrelay, makesmtpaccess, makesmtpaccess-msa, makeuserdb, makeuucpneighbors, mimegpg, mkesmtpdcert, mkimapdcert, mkpop3dcert, pop3d, pop3d-ssl, preline, pw2userdb, reformail, reformime, rmail, sendmail, sharedindexinstall, sharedindexsplit, showconfig, showmodules, testmxlookup, userdb, userdbpw, vchkpw2userdb and webgpg.

sect3.title: cancelmsg
sect3.para: cancelmsg removes a message from the mail queue.

sect3.title: courier
sect3.para: courier Courier is a modular multi-protocol E-mail transport agent. The courier command is an administrative command, and most of its options are only available to the superuser..

sect3.title: courierfilter
sect3.para: courierfilter commands install or uninstall global mail filters. Global mail filters are used to selectively block unwanted mail.

sect3.title: couriermlm
sect3.para: couriermlm is the Courier mailing list manager.

sect3.title: filterctl
sect3.para: filterctl commands install or uninstall global mail filters. Global mail filters are used to selectively block unwanted mail.

sect3.title: lockmail
sect3.para: lockmail is a helper utility for working with mailbox files..

sect3.title: mailbot
sect3.para: mailbot reads an E-mail message on standard input and creates an E-mail message replying to the original message's sender..

sect3.title: maildirkw
sect3.para: maildirkw modifies Courier-IMAP compatible maildir message keywords.

sect3.title: maildrop
sect3.para: maildrop is a replacement local mail delivery agent that includes a mail filtering language.

sect3.title: makeacceptmailfor
sect3.para: makeacceptmailfor Build a list of domains to accept mail for from the /etc/courier/esmtpacceptmailfor.dirdirectory.

sect3.title: makealiases
sect3.para: makealiases Build a list of aliases from /etc/courier/aliases or /etc/courier/aliasdir directories.

sect3.title: makehosteddomains
sect3.para: makehostedomains Build a database of hosted domains from hosteddomains .

sect3.title: makepercentrelay
sect3.para: makepercentrelay Build a list of %-relayed domains from percentrelay.dir directory.

sect3.title: makesmtpaccess
sect3.para: makesmtpacces Build ESMTP server access file from /etc/courier/smtpaccess directory.

sect3.title: makesmtpaccess-msa
sect3.para: makesmtpaccess-msa Build ESMTP server access file from /etc/courier/smtpaccess directory. This esmtp list is for the MSA protocol.

sect3.title: makeuucpneighbors
sect3.para: makeuucpneighbors Builds a list of UUCP recipient's using /etc/courier/uucpneighbors .

sect3.title: reformail
sect3.para: reformail program reads a message on standard input, reformats it in some way, and writes the message to standard output.

sect3.title: reformime
sect3.para: reformime is a utility for reformatting MIME messages.

sect3.title: sendmail
sect3.para: sendmail command reads an E-mail message and delivers the message to its recipients. This sendmail command is part of the Courier mail server, although it attempts to emulate the behavior of the original sendmail MTA.

sect3.title: showconfig
sect3.para: showconfig Shows the current Courier configuration.

sect3.title: showmodules
sect3.para: showmodules Shows the current Courier modules.

sect3.title: testmxlookup
sect3.para: testmxlookup lists the names and IP addresses of mail relays that receive mail for the domain. This is useful in diagnosing mail delivery problems..
